title: Onboarding - eSIM Activation
description: A new customer with a compatible phone wants to activate their service using an eSIM instead of a physical SIM.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's phone model is eSIM compatible.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the device supports eSIM.

tasks.description: Generate an eSIM QR code and send it to the customer's email.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates and emails the QR code.

tasks.description: Guide the customer on how to scan the QR code in their phone's settings to complete activation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for eSIM activation.
